github-credentials.name: GitHub Credentials
github-credentials.description: Block used to manage GitHub authentication.
github-credentials.code_example:
Load stored GitHub credentials:
```python
from prefect_github import GitHubCredentials
github_credentials_block = GitHubCredentials.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: GitHubCredentials
fields.description: Block used to manage GitHub authentication.

github-repository.name: GitHub Repository
github-repository.description: Interact with files stored on GitHub repositories.
github-repository.code_example:
```python
from prefect_github.repository import GitHubRepository

github_repository_block = GitHubRepository.load("BLOCK_NAME")
```

fields.title: GitHubRepository
fields.description: Interact with files stored on GitHub repositories.

repository_url.title: Repository URL
repository_url.description: The URL of a GitHub repository to read from, in either HTTPS or SSH format. If you are using a private repo, it must be in the HTTPS format.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: An optional reference to pin to; can be a branch name or tag.

credentials.title: Credentials
credentials.description: An optional GitHubCredentials block for using private GitHub repos.
